device_mount: Handheld; Placed loosely around user (e.g., table)
use_cases_desc: An individual with access to a smartwatch and other personal devices could do everyday tasks cross-device, including data transfer, authentication, active reading, navigation, and user interface distribution.
contribution_desc: A hardware and software hybrid toolkit for prototyping smartwatch-centric cross-device applications, an analysis of the smartwatch cross-device interaction space, and five example interaction techniques and applications.
additional_hardware: six-axis MEMS motion sensor, potentiometer, 2 inch TFT display, USB power supply, and VGA converter
interaction_techniques: Data transfer/sharing; UI distribution; Data exploration; Conduit gestures
fabrication: Arduino and other hardware components soldered on a PCB with a 3D printed enclosure mounted on a wristband
toolkits: academic toolkits; WatchConnect; WPF; Accord; Arduino
